title: Green Wing Seasons 1 & 2 and Xmas Special iPod/iPhone
description:
All converted to mp4s for iPod/iPhone viewing.

An offbeat comedy from the team behind &#039;Smack the Pony&#039;, set in a hospital, and is very much character-based, with storylines involving a staff liasion officer who hates people, a humourless consultant who thinks he&#039;s funny, and a handful of sexual predators and inadequates.  Written by lordedmund

From the award-winning team behind Smack the Pony comes Green Wing, the new comedy series that&#039;s part soap opera, part drama - but all surreal and innovative. Set in a hospital, despite a general lack of medical attention, Green Wing follows new surgical registrar Dr Caroline Todd through her first day at work and beyond, starting out as she means to go on - dishevelled and under-deodorised having spent the night in her car. Among the bizarre cast of characters, who are the good guys and who are the bad guys - and what sort of Guy is Guy Secretan, the smooth talking anaesthetist? Written by Liz Ward
